Sentencas: This paper reports the heating performances of steam generator for solid oxide fuel cell using waste heat from solid particles.
Titulo: Study on heating performances of steam generator for solid oxide fuel cell using waste heat from solid particles

Sentencas: The model of trapezoid-fin-tube heat exchanger was set up by using FLUENT 14.0.
Titulo: Study on heating performances of steam generator for solid oxide fuel cell using waste heat from solid particles

Sentencas: The model has been used to investigate the effects of fin tip width (2 mm-4 mm) and fin height (34 mm-46 mm).
Titulo: Study on heating performances of steam generator for solid oxide fuel cell using waste heat from solid particles

Sentencas: The fin surface temperature, the particle temperature, the fin total heat flux, the heat recovery efficiency and the heat transfer coefficient were studied.
Titulo: Study on heating performances of steam generator for solid oxide fuel cell using waste heat from solid particles

Sentencas: The heating performance of steam generator is improved when the trapezoid-fins are placed on heat transfer tubes, which is conducive to increase the power generation efficiency of solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Study on heating performances of steam generator for solid oxide fuel cell using waste heat from solid particles

Sentencas: When the fin height increases from 34 mm to 46 mm, the average temperature of calcined petroleum coke decrease from 414 K to 376 K, the maximum temperature decrease from 498 K to 442 K, the average heat transfer coefficient of internal and external heat exchanger increase 12.4% and 12.7% respectively, the heat recovery efficiency increases 4.3%.
Titulo: Study on heating performances of steam generator for solid oxide fuel cell using waste heat from solid particles

Sentencas: When the fin tip width increases from 2 mm to 3 mm, the average temperature reduce 6.7 K and the maximum temperature decrease 7.3 K, the average heat transfer coefficient of internal and external heat exchanger increase 3.8% and 3.7% respectively, the heat recovery efficiency increases 0.88%.
Titulo: Study on heating performances of steam generator for solid oxide fuel cell using waste heat from solid particles
